FC_code: This is a list of disease causing host-Phytophthora interactions involving important UK forestry species, based on the list on the FC website

FC "60 tree species that are either widely grown in British forests at the present time or which could play an increasing role in the future, focusing on those species which could be expected to produce usable timber in British conditions."
I have added horse chestnut and yew to this list
We may want to add others
